text: Mbe mba suambarar Zisas ga mbuim, ana mbe ndɨkndɨgi kaŋgiap, khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Maaŋ muuŋgip, ŋgu bakɨ the rɨgɨra wari shɨrav wari shogɨrga, mba ŋgu bakɨme guigira mbatɨgirga. Maaŋ muuŋgip, vhɨra ŋgu bakɨ the o, phena bavira ki ntɨɨri, mbe rɨgɨra wari shɨrav wari shogɨrga, mba ŋgu bakɨme gum phen mbara muuŋgip za mbatɨgirga.
